description: Weekly topic-based quizzes with multiple attempts and immediate feedback. Tests understanding of DC/AC circuits, transient behavior, phasors, operational amplifiers, and system design.

Combination of weekly lab tasks (pre-work analytical questions and in-class experiments) and a practical exam. Assesses circuit-building skills, equipment operation, WHS compliance, and validation of analysis results.
In-person exam testing analytical understanding of DC circuits, transient behavior, phasors, and system design. Includes a self-marking component for partial marks.
Comprehensive exam covering all course content including DC/AC circuits, operational amplifiers, transient analysis, and AC power. Requires minimum 40% score to pass course.
